data.title: UTC to Tehran, Iran
data.meta_description: Time conversion from Universal Time Coordinated (+0) to IST (Iran Standard Time)(+3:30). UTC to Tehran, Iran time zones converter, calculator, table and map.
data.text:
Time Difference

Universal Time Coordinated is 3 hours and 30 minutes behind IST (Iran Standard Time)

6:00 am06:00 in UTC is 9:30 am09:30 in Tehran, Iran

UTC to Tehran call time

Best time for a conference call or a meeting is between 8am-2:30pm in UTC which corresponds to 11:30am-6pm in Tehran

6:00 am06:00 Universal Time Coordinated (UTC). Offset UTC 0:00 hours

9:30 am09:30 IST (Iran Standard Time) (Tehran, Iran). Offset UTC +3:30 hours

6:00 am06:00 UTC / 9:30 am09:30 Tehran, Iran

Universal Time Coordinated

Offset: UTC is 0 hours ahead Greenwich Mean Time (GMT) and is used in Universal

Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) is the world time standard that regulates clocks and time. It is successor to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT). For casual use, UTC is the same as GMT, but is used by the scientific community.

UTC is the time standard commonly used across the world since 1972. It is used in many technical fields, like aviation industry and meteorologists, also used to synchronize time across internet networks.

UTC representations, usage and related time zones

W3C/ISO-8601: International standard covering representation and exchange of dates and time-related data

Z - is the zone designator for the zero UTC/GMT offset, also known as 'Zulu' time

+00 - basic short

+0000 - basic

+00:00 - extended

Email/RFC-2822: Internet Message Format Date Standard, typically used for timestamps in email headers

+0000 - sign character (+) followed by a four digit time providing hours (00) and minutes (00) of the offset. Indicates zero hour and zero minutes time differences of the zero meridian.

Military/NATO: Used by the U.S. military, Chinese military and others

Zulu - Military abbreviation for UTC

Z - short form of 'Zulu'

IANA/Olson: Reflects UTC time zone boundaries defined by political bodies, primarily intended for use with computer programs and operating systems

Etc/UCT

Etc/UTC

Etc/Universal

Etc/Zulu

Time zones with the GMT +0 offset:

EGST - Eastern Greenland Summer Time

GMT - Greenwich Mean Time

WET - Western European Time

AZOST - Azores Summer Time

UTC - Universal Time Coordinated

WT - Western Sahara Standard Time

Z - Zulu Time Zone
